entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 18.
